---
title: "qPCR"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(mbtools)
```

```{r}
classes <- c(public_client_id = "character", vendor_observation_id = "character")
cohort <- fread("data/manifest.csv", colClasses = classes)[has_close_microbiome == T]
```

```{r}
qpcr <- fread("data/16S_qPCR.csv", colClasses = c(Sample_ID = "character"))
qpcr <- qpcr[cohort, on = c(Sample_ID = "vendor_observation_id")]
qpcr[, Copies_per_Gram_Soil := as.numeric(gsub(",", "", Copies_per_Gram_Soil))]
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())

ggplot(qpcr, aes(x=age, y=Copies_per_Gram_Soil/1e9)) + geom_point() + labs(y = "16S copy no. [1e9/g stool]")
```

```{r}
glm(Copies_per_Gram_Soil ~ age + bmi + subset, data=qpcr) %>% summary()
```
